posts.post_content:
Over the last few years, as I've been working towards my set, I've accumulated a few duplicates and figured I'd post here to see if anyone needs them/are interested.  Pictures available upon request (I won't be able to send until tomorrow though):

John Anderson - SGC 2.5 - Piedmont - $30 - SOLD
John Ganzel - PSA 3 - Piedmont - $37 - SOLD
Bill Hallman - PSA 2.5 - Piedmont - $30 - SOLD
Jack Hayden - PSA 3 - Sweet Caporal - $37 - SOLD
Bill Hinchman - PSA 2 - Sweet Capotal - $28
Tom Jones - PSA 2 - Piedmont - $32 - SOLD
Rube Kisinger - PSA 3 - Piedmont - $37
Rube Manning (Batting)- PSA 3 - Piedmont - $37 -SOLD
Al Mattern - PSA 2.5 - Piedmont - $30 - SOLD
Clyde Milan - PSA 3 - Piedmont - $37 - SOLD
Jim Pastorius - PSA 2 - Piedmont - $28 - SOLD

For 1 card add $3 shipping
For 2+ cards - add $5 shipping
I’ll take Anderson, Hallman and Mattern. Sending a PM

I will take Hayden, Manning, Milan and Pastorius. I will PM you

Thanks
